title: The Sword of God
description: “The prophecy! The prophecy!When the end is near, what was wrong will be right,He who was lost in darkness will return covered in light.A master of war from lands far away,Will guide them on the path and show each of them the way.A young girl of strong will, dear to her friendWill never cease the fight, even until the end.Finally, the ghost, a memory from the pastHe must return to change what was last.Only then can the Angel be savedBefore the dead return from their graves.”The chilling words haunt Jacob and his companions as they remain trapped in the depths of Hell. Was their sacrifice enough to reveal the Sword of God?	And on the surface, the dead have risen to the call of their demon masters. Friends and surprising allies prepare for the Final War for humanity, but will their fight be enough to prevent extinction?	Author Scott W. Kimak brings an end to his climactic trilogy in this breathtaking, action-packed, page-turner.
author: Scott W. Kimak
